pr_title: DB-11063 Left outer broadcast join for more cases.

timeline.message: DB-11063 Left outer broadcast join for more cases.

timeline.bodyText: @msirek should we also allow RIGHTOUTERJOIN here, or at this point we only have LEFT OUTER ?
timeline.author: dgomezferro

replies.bodyText: @dgomezferro For join algorithms we currently only have left outer join.  If we specify a right outer join in SQL it is executed using a left outer join algorithm (but with left and right tables swapped).  There is a test for it in BroadCastJoinIT.
replies.author: msirek
